description: Designed for comfort, these lightweight and packable full-stretch trousers are ideal for trekking in warm conditions where freedom of movement is paramount. They are made of a durable, double-woven stretch fabric that dries quickly and protects legs from rough terrain. They have a comfortable, elasticated waistband, zippered mesh hand pockets and a laminated zippered leg pocket to reduce risk of chafing. It has an internal media pocket and laminated pocket bag for extra comfort. Articulated knees, tapered legs and leg endings with drawcord adjustments.
name: Fjallraven Abisko Trail Stretch Trousers, Reg - Mens
